The great freedom of action in Crimes & Punishments allows you to
conduct your investigations in the manner you deem appropriate. Use
the 14 extraordinary skills of detection for which Sherlock is famous,
choose the avenues of enquiry you wish to pursue, interrogate your
suspects and, from your deductions, name the guilty parties... you
can even determine their fate The ramifications are far-reaching,
and your decisions will exert a real influence through your reputation
or the surprising consequences that will arise where you least expect
them.
